vclaim: Kellogg's Corn Flakes were originally created in an effort to discourage American consumers from masturbating.
title: Were Kellogg’s Corn Flakes Created as an ‘Anti-Masturbatory Morning Meal’?
subtitle: Numerous websites exaggerated the role of J.H. Kellogg's odd beliefs about sexual health in the creation of the breakfast cereal.
author: Dan MacGuill
